1123690.name: Light of the Locked World Demo
1123690.description:
The demo has enough content for 30-60 minutes of play. Available content: First two quests, Moonrise Desert area, tier 1 crafting and loot.

Cruel whispers in the back of your mind... Dead cities, lands devastated by war. Grotesque past and hopeful future. Shining spires reflected in the waters of the abyss. Welcome, immigrant, to the Locked World, it is yours to unlock. To build a destiny from the ruins.

Light of the Locked World is a fantasy role-playing game, a love letter to old-school MMORPGs of the time when game design was a new field of exploration.

Features:

  • Story of a humble immigrant answering a call to fight a mysterious threat

  • Unique world at the brink of a magical industrial revolution

  • Real-time combat system with dozens of spells and weapons

  • Oldschool charms and powerful atmosphere

  • Flexible local multiplayer mode for two players

  • Extensive character customisation

  • Impactful crafting systems
